attributes.additional_details: Understand and acknowledge that Boris Johnson is very slow in dealing with Covid-19. Discuss his recent actions and constant U-turns. Give the role to Jeremy Corbyn as he is a born leader of the people and for the people. He will act fast and safely, protecting the country and citizens.
attributes.background: Make Boris Johnson step down from the role as PM as he is failing the UK with the current outbreak of Covid-19. He is not a powerful nor is he a respected PM which is why people are failing to follow his instructions.

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about honours and appointments, which includes calling for a Minister to lose their job.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
